Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players")
KeyControls = Tool:WaitForChild("KeyControls") CameraControl = Tool:WaitForChild("CameraControl")
Sit = Tool:WaitForChild("SitAnim")
Camera = game:GetService("Workspace").CurrentCamera
CameraControl.OnClientInvoke = (function(player) return Camera.CoordinateFrame end)
function OnKey(Key, Down) pcall(function() KeyControls:InvokeServer(Key, Down) end) end
function Button1Down() pcall(function() KeyControls:InvokeServer("Button1Down", Humanoid.TargetPoint) end) end
function Equipped(Mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if not Player then return end Mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() Button1Down() end) Mouse.KeyDown:connect(function(Key) OnKey(Key, true) end) Mouse.KeyUp:connect(function(Key) OnKey(Key, false) end) Humanoid.PlatformStand = true SitAnim = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Sit) if SitAnim then SitAnim:Play() end end
function Unequipped() Player = nil Humanoid.PlatformStand = false if SitAnim then SitAnim:Stop() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle") Mesh = Handle:WaitForChild("Mesh")
SwooshSound = Handle:WaitForChild("Swoosh") ExplosionSound = Handle:WaitForChild("Explosion")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
KeyControl = (Tool:FindFirstChild("KeyControls") or Instance.new("RemoteFunction")) KeyControl.Name = "KeyControls" KeyControl.Parent = Tool
CameraControl = (Tool:FindFirstChild("CameraControl") or Instance.new("RemoteFunction")) CameraControl.Name = "CameraControl" CameraControl.Parent = Tool
Part = Instance.new("Part") Part.Material = Enum.Material.Plastic Part.Shape = Enum.PartType.Block Part.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Part.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Part.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom Part.CanCollide = true Part.Locked = true
Rocket = Part:Clone() Rocket.Name = "Rocket" Rocket.Size = Vector3.new(1.25, 0.8, 4.75) Rocket.CanCollide = false RocketMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") RocketMesh.MeshType = Enum.MeshType.FileMesh RocketMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset?id=169308422" RocketMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset?id=169293310" RocketMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) RocketMesh.Parent = Rocket
SmokePart = Part:Clone() SmokePart.Name = "SmokePart" SmokePart.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, 0.2) SmokePart.Transparency = 1 SmokePart.CanCollide = false Smoke = Instance.new("Smoke") Smoke.Color = Color3.new((100 / 255), (100 / 255), (100 / 255)) Smoke.Opacity = 0.4 Smoke.RiseVelocity = 0.1 Smoke.Size = 0.1 Smoke.Enabled = false Smoke.Parent = SmokePart
ChairMeshes = { Chair = "http://www.roblox.com/asset?id=169308373", ChairWithRockets = "http://www.roblox.com/asset?id=169293184" }
CamSpeed = { X = {Normal = 40, Boost = 80}, Z = {Normal = 50, Boost = 100}, }
Controls = { Forward = false, Backward = false, Left = false, Right = false }
ReloadTime = 5 ExplosionDamage = 50
Gravity = 196.20 LastSpace = 0
SpeedBoostEnabled = true SpeedBoostInUse = false SpeedBoostDuration = 10 SpeedBoostReloadTime = 10
SpeedFire = {}
Equipped = false
Mesh.MeshId = ChairMeshes.ChairWithRockets
KeyControl.OnServerInvoke = (function(Player, Key, Value) local OriginalKey = Key local Key = Key:lower() if OriginalKey == "Button1Down" then Button1Down(Value) elseif Key == "w" or Key == "" then Controls.Forward = Value elseif Key == "a" or Key == "" then Controls.Left = Value elseif Key == "s" or Key == "" then Controls.Backward = Value elseif Key == "d" or Key == "" then Controls.Right = Value elseif Key == " " and (LastSpace == 0 or (tick() - LastSpace) > 1.9) and Chair and Chair.Parent then local Hit, Position = RayCast(Chair.Position, Vector3.new(0, -1, 0), Chair.Size.Y, {Character}) if Hit then LastSpace = tick() local BodyForce = Instance.new("BodyForce") BodyForce.force = Vector3.new(0, (((GetTotalMass(Character) * Gravity) * 4) * 1.125), 0) Debris:AddItem(BodyForce, 0.1) BodyForce.Parent = Chair end elseif Key == "q" then if SpeedBoostEnabled and not SpeedBoostInUse and LeftRocket and LeftRocket.Parent and LeftRocketWeld and LeftRocketWeld.Parent and RightRocket and RightRocket.Parent and RightRocketWeld and RightRocketWeld.Parent then SpeedBoostEnabled = false SpeedBoostInUse = true for i, v in pairs({LeftRocket, RightRocket}) do if v and v.Parent then local Fire = Instance.new("Fire") Fire.Color = Color3.new((255 / 255), (127 / 255), (0 / 255)) Fire.SecondaryColor = Color3.new((255 / 255), (0 / 255), (0 / 255)) Fire.Heat = 5 Fire.Size = 5 Fire.Enabled = true table.insert(SpeedFire, Fire) Fire.Parent = v end end wait(SpeedBoostDuration) SpeedBoostInUse = false for i, v in pairs(SpeedFire) do if v and v.Parent then v:Destroy() end end SpeedFire = {} wait(SpeedBoostReloadTime) SpeedBoostEnabled = true end end end)
function RayCast(Position, Direction, MaxDistance, IgnoreList) return game:GetService("Workspace"):FindPartOnRayWithIgnoreList(Ray.new(Position, Direction.unit * (MaxDistance or 999.999)), IgnoreList) end
function GetTotalMass(Parent) local TotalMass = 0 for i, v in pairs(Parent:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("BasePart") then TotalMass = TotalMass + v:GetMass() end GetTotalMass(v) end return TotalMass end
function FindCharacterAncestor(Parent) if Parent and Parent ~= game:GetService("Workspace") then local humanoid = Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid then return Parent, humanoid else return FindCharacterAncestor(Parent.Parent) end end return nil end
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local Creator_Tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator_Tag.Name = "creator" Creator_Tag.Value = player Debris:AddItem(Creator_Tag, 2) Creator_Tag.Parent = humanoid end
function UntagHumanoid(humanoid) for i, v in pairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ObjectValue") and v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end
function HandleMovement(CoordinateFrame) if not Player or not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health == 0 or not Torso then return end local CoordinateFrame local CameraReady = pcall(function() CoordinateFrame = CameraControl:InvokeClient(Player) end) if not CoordinateFrame then return end if (Chair.Position - CoordinateFrame.p).magnitude < 5 then FlightPower.velocity = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) FlightSpin.cframe = Chair.CFrame return end if BurnSmoke and BurnSmoke.Parent then if Controls.Forward or Controls.Backward or Controls.Left or Controls.Right then BurnSmoke.Enabled = true else BurnSmoke.Enabled = false end end local NewPush = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) local ForwardVector = CoordinateFrame:vectorToWorldSpace(Vector3.new(0, 0, -1))
if Controls.Forward and not Controls.Backward then NewPush = (ForwardVector * (((SpeedBoostInUse and CamSpeed.Z.Boost) or CamSpeed.Z.Normal) * 1)) end if Controls.Backward and not Controls.Forward then NewPush = (NewPush + ForwardVector * (((SpeedBoostInUse and CamSpeed.Z.Boost) or CamSpeed.Z.Normal) * -1)) end if Controls.Left and not Controls.Right then NewPush = (NewPush + CoordinateFrame:vectorToWorldSpace(Vector3.new(-1, 0, 0)) * (((SpeedBoostInUse and CamSpeed.X.Boost) or CamSpeed.X.Normal) * 1)) end if Controls.Right and not Controls.Left then NewPush = (NewPush + CoordinateFrame:vectorToWorldSpace(Vector3.new(1, 0, 0)) * (((SpeedBoostInUse and CamSpeed.X.Boost) or CamSpeed.X.Normal) * 1)) end
if NewPush.magnitude < 1 then FlightPower.maxForce = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) else FlightPower.maxForce = Vector3.new((FlightPower.P * 100), 0, (FlightPower.P * 100)) end
FlightSpin.cframe = CFrame.new(Chair.Position, Vector3.new(CoordinateFrame.p.X, Chair.Position.Y, CoordinateFrame.p.Z)) * CFrame.Angles(0, math.pi, 0)
FlightPower.velocity = NewPush
end
function CheckTable(Table, Instance) for i, v in pairs(Table) do if v == Instance then return true end end return false end
function CreateChair() if Chair and Chair.Parent then Chair:Destroy() end Chair = Handle:Clone() Chair.Name = "Chair" Chair.Size = Vector3.new(3, 6.5, 4.5) Chair.Transparency = 0 Chair.CanCollide = true ChairWeld = Instance.new("Weld") ChairWeld.Part0 = Torso ChairWeld.Part1 = Chair ChairWeld.C0 = CFrame.new(0, -1, 0, 1, 0, -0, 0, 0, 1, 0, -1, -0) ChairWeld.C1 = CFrame.new(0, 0.4, -0.75) * CFrame.Angles((-math.pi / 2), 0, 0) ChairWeld.Parent = Chair Chair.Parent = Character
SmokePartClone = SmokePart:Clone() SmokePartWeld = Instance.new("Weld") SmokePartWeld.Part0 = SmokePartClone SmokePartWeld.Part1 = Chair SmokePartWeld.C1 = CFrame.new(0, -2.75, 0) SmokePartWeld.Parent = SmokePartClone SmokePartClone.Parent = Chair BurnSmoke = SmokePartClone:FindFirstChild("Smoke")
FlightPower = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") FlightPower.Name = "FlightPower" FlightPower.velocity = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) FlightPower.P = 1000000 FlightPower.maxForce = Vector3.new(FlightPower.P, FlightPower.P, FlightPower.P) FlightPower.P = 10000 FlightPower.Parent = Chair
FlightSpin = Instance.new("BodyGyro") FlightSpin.Name = "FlightSpin" FlightSpin.P = 1000000 FlightSpin.maxTorque = Vector3.new(FlightSpin.P, FlightSpin.P, FlightSpin.P) FlightSpin.cframe = Chair.CFrame FlightSpin.Parent = Chair
end
function RefuelRockets() if SpeedBoostInUse then return end for i, v in pairs({LeftRocket, RightRocket}) do if v and v.Parent then v:Destroy() end end if Chair and Chair.Parent then LeftRocket = Rocket:Clone() LeftRocket.Name = "LeftRocket" LeftRocketWeld = Instance.new("Weld") LeftRocketWeld.Part0 = LeftRocket LeftRocketWeld.Part1 = Chair LeftRocketWeld.C1 = CFrame.new(-0.75, -0.925, 0) LeftRocketWeld.Parent = LeftRocket RightRocket = Rocket:Clone() RightRocket.Name = "RightRocket" RightRocketWeld = Instance.new("Weld") RightRocketWeld.Part0 = RightRocket RightRocketWeld.Part1 = Chair RightRocketWeld.C1 = CFrame.new(0.75, -0.925, 0) RightRocketWeld.Parent = RightRocket LeftRocket.Parent = Chair RightRocket.Parent = Chair end end
function Reload() Tool.Enabled = false local ToolEnabled = false local ToolChanged ToolChanged = Tool.Changed:connect(function(Property) if Property == "Enabled" and Tool.Enabled then ToolEnabled = true ToolChanged:disconnect() end end) wait(ReloadTime) if not ToolEnabled then RefuelRockets() Tool.Enabled = true end end
function Button1Down(TargetPoint) if not Tool.Enabled or SpeedBoostInUse then return end local SelectedWeld local SelectedRocket local OutOfFieldOfView = (math.acos((TargetPoint - Torso.Position).unit:Dot(Chair.CFrame.lookVector)) > 1.25) if OutOfFieldOfView then return end if LeftRocket and LeftRocket.Parent and LeftRocketWeld and LeftRocketWeld.Parent then SelectedWeld = LeftRocketWeld SelectedRocket = LeftRocket LeftRocket = nil elseif RightRocket and RightRocket.Parent and RightRocketWeld and RightRocketWeld.Parent then SelectedWeld = RightRocketWeld SelectedRocket = RightRocket RightRocket = nil end if SelectedRocket and SelectedWeld then SelectedRocket.CanCollide = true local RocketSwoosh = SwooshSound:Clone() RocketSwoosh.Parent = SelectedRocket local RocketExplosion = ExplosionSound:Clone() RocketExplosion.Parent = SelectedRocket local BodyForce = Instance.new("BodyForce") local Force = (SelectedRocket:GetMass() * Gravity) BodyForce.force = Vector3.new(0, Force, 0) BodyForce.Parent = SelectedRocket local BodyGyro = Instance.new("BodyGyro") BodyGyro.maxTorque = Vector3.new((Force ^ 2), (Force ^ 2), (Force ^ 2)) BodyGyro.Parent = SelectedRocket local Fire = Instance.new("Fire") Fire.Color = Color3.new((255 / 255), (127 / 255), (0 / 255)) Fire.SecondaryColor = Color3.new((255 / 255), (0 / 255), (0 / 255)) Fire.Heat = 5 Fire.Size = 2.5 Fire.Enabled = true Fire.Parent = SelectedRocket local Smoke = Instance.new("Smoke") Smoke.Color = Color3.new((100 / 255), (100 / 255), (100 / 255)) Smoke.Opacity = 0.5 Smoke.RiseVelocity = 0.25 Smoke.Size = 0.1 Smoke.Enabled = true Smoke.Parent = SelectedRocket RocketSwoosh:Play() Debris:AddItem(SelectedRocket, 3) SelectedWeld:Destroy() SelectedRocket.Touched:connect(function(Hit) if Hit and Hit.Parent then local character = FindCharacterAncestor(Hit) if (not character or (character and character ~= Character)) then RocketSwoosh:Stop() RocketExplosion:Play() local Explosion = Instance.new("Explosion") Explosion.ExplosionType = Enum.ExplosionType.NoCraters Explosion.BlastPressure = 0 Explosion.BlastRadius = 15 Explosion.Position = SelectedRocket.Position local HumanoidsHit = {} Explosion.Hit:connect(function(Hit2) if Hit2 and Hit2.Parent then local character2 = FindCharacterAncestor(Hit2) if (not character2 or (character2 and character2 ~= Character)) then local HitParent = Hit2.Parent if HitParent:IsA("Hat") or HitParent:IsA("Handle") then HitParent = HitParent.Parent end local humanoid = HitParent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 and not CheckTable(HumanoidsHit, humanoid) then table.insert(HumanoidsHit, humanoid) UntagHumanoid(humanoid) TagHumanoid(humanoid, Player) if (Hit2.Position - Explosion.Position).magnitude <= (Explosion.BlastRadius / 2) then humanoid:TakeDamage(humanoid.MaxHealth) else humanoid:TakeDamage(ExplosionDamage) end end if not character2 then Hit2:BreakJoints() Hit2.Velocity = CFrame.new(Explosion.Position, Hit2.Position).lookVector * 100 end end end end) Explosion.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace") if SelectedRocket and SelectedRocket.Parent then SelectedRocket:Destroy() end end end end) SelectedRocket.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace") SelectedRocket.CFrame = SelectedRocket.CFrame + SelectedRocket.CFrame.lookVector * (SelectedRocket.Size.Z * 1.05) SelectedRocket.Velocity = CFrame.new(SelectedRocket.Position, TargetPoint).lookVector * 150 BodyGyro.cframe = CFrame.new(SelectedRocket.Position, TargetPoint) end if ((not LeftRocketWeld and not RightRocketWeld) or (not LeftRocketWeld.Parent and not RightRocketWeld.Parent)) then Reload() end end
function Equipped()
Unequipped = false local UnequippedConnection UnequippedConnection = Tool.Unequipped:connect(function() Unequipped = true UnequippedConnection:disconnect() end)
wait(0.3)
if Unequipped then return else UnequippedConnection:disconnect() end
Equipped = true Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") Torso = Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") if not Player or not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health == 0 or not Torso then return end
Mesh.MeshId = ChairMeshes.Chair
if not Equipped then return end
Humanoid.PlatformStand = true
Handle.Transparency = 1
CreateChair()
local Hit, Position = RayCast(Torso.Position, Vector3.new(0, -1, 0), (Torso.Size.Y * 2), {Character}) if Hit then Torso.CFrame = Torso.CFrame + Vector3.new(0, (Torso.Size.Y + Chair.Size.Y), 0) end
Spawn(function() if not Tool.Enabled then Reload() else RefuelRockets() end end)
Spawn(function() while Equipped and Chair.Parent and FlightPower.Parent and FlightSpin.Parent do HandleMovement() wait(0.0001) end end)
end
function Unequipped() if not Equipped then return end Equipped = false SpeedBoostInUse = false Mesh.MeshId = ChairMeshes.ChairWithRockets if Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent then Humanoid.PlatformStand = false end if Torso and Torso.Parent then Torso.Velocity = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) end for i, v in pairs(Controls) do Controls[i] = false end if Chair and Chair.Parent then Chair:Destroy() end SpeedFire = {} if not LeftRocket or not RightRocket then Tool.Enabled = false end Handle.Transparency = 0 end
Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Mouse_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png" Reloading_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png"
Tool = script.Parent
Mouse = nil
function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and Mouse_Icon or Reloading_Icon end end
function OnEquipped(ToolMouse) Mouse = ToolMouse UpdateIcon() end
function OnChanged(Property) if Property == "Enabled" then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Changed:connect(OnChanged)
